cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with a bandit game and online optimization, which are topics commonly studied in the machine learning and optimization communities. The use of convex polytopes and matrices also suggests a connection to discrete mathematics and linear algebra, which are often studied in computer science. Therefore, likely arXiv CS sub-categories include cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
